topic.title: Converting Old Templates to Newer Versions

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

keywords.indexterm: WebHelp Responsive Converting old publishing templates

body.p: WebHelp templates that were created in older versions of can be converted to the Publishing Template format that was introduced in version 20.0. This section contains procedures for converting old templates depending on the version they were created in.You must convert each version sequentially, one at a time (for example, you cannot convert version 27.0 directly to version 28.0, you must first convert it to 27.1 and then to 28.0. Make sure you follow the procedure in each migration topic to ensure a smooth transition and avoid compatibility issues.
